messages.message: You have not attached an indictment to the claim. Please can you provide an indictment within the next 48 hours or I will have to reject the claim.

Your claim has been rejected: No indictment attached

We rejected your claim because you didn't attach the indictment. Please submit the claim again with the indictment. You can download a copy from the Digital Case System.

messages.message: You have not attached a representation order to the claim. Please can you provide a representation order within the next 48 hours or I will have to reject the claim.

Your claim has been rejected: No representation order

We rejected your claim because you didn’t attach the representation order. Please submit the claim again with the representation order. You can get a copy from the Magistrates' Court where it was issued.
